Messages.Message: xx'Internet Proxy Host' minimum length is 4.
xx'Internet Proxy Host' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
xx'Internet Proxy Port' minimum length is 2.
xx'Internet Proxy Port' is required when Access the Internet using a proxy server contains a 'checkmark'.
